system.description:
There are energy weapons, and there are starglaives. When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you learn to construct a starglaive at no cost, a custom energy weapon harmonically attuned to your psionic energies via the use of a psychic crystal. The psychic crystal in the weapon can serve as your psionic focus. When you construct this weapon, you may choose the type of damage it causes from the following list: fire, cold; you may also choose from radiant (if you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.zKZqzInC61s8zeN2]{The High Road} as your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.RVMwA6x52FWL9CK9]{Code of Conscience}), necrotic (if you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.Yv3J5Pw5r5pqATSj]{The Steep Climb}), or force (if you chose @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.bvVbZnVNVwvfLG0X]{The Axis of Balance}).

If you lose your starglaive or it is destroyed, you may construct a replacement; this process takes one month. You can only attune to one starglaive at a time, and any starglaive you create using this feature cannot be attuned to by anybody except you.

You are always considered proficient with a starglaive you have constructed.
